page.title: 01BINGHAM-GENERAL DESCRIPTION
page.content: Bingham is a busy place to live in. It is a small town but is growing as more houses are being built. There are two churches, four schools and a library. You will also find a large shopping centre, quite a few pubs and a leisure centre. There is a Fire Station, a Police Station, a railway station and a bus service to Nottingham, Derby and Grantham. The main road through the town is now so busy that plans for a bypass are underway. At the centre of the town ia market place where a market is held each Thursday. Here you will also find a famous landmark:- The Buttercross. Around Bingham are many small and delightful villages and open country. There is an RAF station at Newton which is not far away.
